title: Command-Line Arguments
description: In this lab, we will explore JavaScript's command-line argument handling mechanism. We will learn how to retrieve the command-line arguments passed to a Node.js script and how to process them. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to use command-line arguments in your JavaScript applications.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
